column4: Anyone know where I can get the drivers for an Nvidia GeForce4 420 Go (laptop) Video card? the NV free ones don't work
Anyone know where I can get the drivers for an Nvidia GeForce4 420 Go (laptop) Video card? the NV free ones(from add/remove) don't work for me :(
NVIDIA has them on their website. alternately their is a program called "envy" that fetches and installs them automatically. it can have unpredictable results, though.
thanks, I'll try the Nvidia site and if I fail I'll come back for an adventure with Envy :P
